title: Gregor Townsend keen to stay on as Scotland head coach but accepts decision is out of his hands
text:
Gregor Townsend vowed not to walk away as Scotland head coach despite their group-stage exit from the World Cup.

Supporters on social media were calling for Townsend to be dismissed after Scotland failed to qualify for the knockout stages for just the second time in their history. ​

After slumping to an opening 27-3 defeat by Ireland, Scotland ­rebounded with convincing victories against Samoa and Russia only to come up short in a frenetic 28-21 defeat by Japan at the Yokohama International Stadium on Sunday.​

Scotland have won 50 per cent of their Tests against tier-one opposition under Townsend, but recorded just one victory in this year’s Six​ Nations, against Italy. Townsend admitted his...
description: Gregor Townsend vowed not to walk away as Scotland head coach despite their group-stage exit from the World Cup.
